sentences.en: Don't gulp everything down without masticating.
sentences.cn: 不要不加咀嚼就把什么都给一股脑地吞下去。

sentences.en: Don't gulp your food, chew it before you swallow it.
sentences.cn: 吃东西不要狼吞虎咽, 要嚼碎了再咽下去.

sentences.en: having emptied his glass at a gulp, Roger pulled out a cigar.
sentences.cn: 将杯中的酒一饮而尽后，罗杰抽出一支雪茄。

sentences.en: He swallowed a glass of beer at one gulp.
sentences.cn: 他一囗气喝下一杯啤酒.

sentences.en: He took a big gulp and almost chocked.
I cannot toss off the glass of soda water in one gulp.
sentences.cn: 我不能一口气喝完那杯汽水.

sentences.en: I gulped when I saw the bill.
sentences.cn: 看到账单时我倒吸了一口气。

sentences.en: I took in a large gulp of air.
Ray took a gulp of coffee and rushed out of the room.
sentences.cn: 雷喝了一大口咖啡,接着便冲出了房间.

sentences.en: She gulped down her breakfast and ran for the bus.
sentences.cn: 她狼吞虎咽地吃完早饭，跑去赶公交车了。
她很快地把汽水一饮而尽。

sentences.en: She took down the tablets in one gulp.
sentences.cn: 她把那些药片一口吞了下去.

sentences.en: She watched Bertha gulp down six cups of tea.
sentences.cn: 她注意到伯莎狼吞虎咽地喝下了六杯茶.

sentences.en: The engineer tossed off the glass of beer almost in one gulp.
sentences.cn: 这位工程师几乎一口气喝完了那杯啤酒.

sentences.en: The old man drained his teacup in one gulp and rubbed his bald head.
sentences.cn: 老头子一口吞了一杯茶,摸了摸秃脑袋.

sentences.en: They gulp down knowledge with unmatched enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 他们如饥似渴地吸收知识.

sentences.en: We swallowed the chocolates in one gulp, licking our lips.
sentences.cn: 我们一口吞下了巧克力，满意地咂着嘴。

sentences.en: When his whisky came he drank half of it in one gulp.
sentences.cn: 威士忌端上来后，他一口气就喝掉了一半。

trans.tran_en: a large amount of something that you swallow quickly, or the action of swallowing

trans.tran_cn: 狼吞虎咽，（因害怕或惊讶而）倒吸气， 大口大口地吸（气）
trans.tran_en: to swallow large quantities of food or drink quickly
